name: ThinkScream
overview:
We develop NewAge Platforms. We reach out to New Audiences. We create Experiences. We solve those Little Problems!

Setup in 2011 , ThinkScream is a New Age Media Solutions Company.

ThinkScream-Connect harnesses the power of WiFi Networks to enhance user experience. Be it malls, cinemas, cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, hospitals or any local retail outlet, we connect businesses to their customers with our Personalised WebApps & WiFi Network solutions.

The custom-built WebApps and tools make users an active part of the place. They can perform most of the basic tasks without any hassle or having to wait. Above all, a user can Connect. Connect to the locale. Connect with other customers. Connect to the World.

Connectivity is a necessity today. This especially holds true for public places. We saw a huge gaping hole in India when it comes to this aspect. Here in India, we have devices which Connect us but not the Network which can!

We are the Network. We want people to have easy access to a Network wherever they are. We want to Connect the People.

offices.address1: A 103, Shubham Center, Cardinal Gracious Road
